description: Known malicious browser extension IDs from security research and advisories

extensions.name: The Great Suspender (Malware Fork)
extensions.description: Tab suspender extension acquired by malicious actor who injected tracking and ad fraud code, removed by Google February 2021, affected 2M users

extensions.name: Hover Zoom+ (DataSpii)
extensions.description: DataSpii campaign extension that collected and exfiltrated browsing history, form data, and page contents to third-party analytics firms

extensions.name: Hola VPN (Bandwidth Selling)
extensions.description: VPN extension that sells user bandwidth via Luminati network, turning machines into exit nodes for unknown third-party traffic

extensions.name: MetaMask (Copycat Phishing)
extensions.description: Fake cryptocurrency wallet impersonator designed to steal seed phrases and private keys via cloned MetaMask UI

extensions.name: CacheFlow Malicious Extension
extensions.description: CacheFlow campaign discovered by Avast, hiding C2 commands in Cache-Control HTTP headers to redirect search results and inject ads

extensions.name: SearchBlox (Roblox Credential Stealer)
extensions.description: Chrome extension marketed as Roblox search tool containing a backdoor stealing Roblox credentials and Rolimons inventory data

extensions.name: Google Translate Impersonator
extensions.description: Fake Google Translate extension mining cryptocurrency in background and injecting malicious scripts into web pages

extensions.name: ChromeLoader / Shampoo
extensions.description: ChromeLoader malware campaign hijacking browser search results, redirecting traffic, and injecting advertisements

extensions.name: Dormant Colors
extensions.description: Dormant Colors campaign with over one million installs, hijacking search results and injecting affiliate tracking codes

extensions.name: VenomSoftX RAT Extension
extensions.description: Browser component of ViperSoftX malware functioning as a remote access trojan, stealing credentials and cryptocurrency wallet addresses

extensions.name: Rilide Stealer Extension
extensions.description: Steals cryptocurrency and credentials by impersonating legitimate extensions like Google Drive, intercepts 2FA codes

extensions.name: Web Paint (Adware)
extensions.description: Browser extension injecting unwanted advertisements and tracking browsing activity across all visited websites

extensions.name: PDF Toolbox
extensions.description: Part of 2023 campaign injecting malicious code into web pages, related extensions accumulated 87M combined downloads

extensions.name: SpeakIt! (DataSpii)
extensions.description: DataSpii campaign text-to-speech extension covertly exfiltrating browsing data and page content to remote analytics servers

extensions.name: ChatGPT for Chrome (Fake)
extensions.description: Fake ChatGPT extension harvesting Facebook session cookies and Business account credentials for ad fraud campaigns

extensions.name: SearchManager
extensions.description: Browser hijacker modifying default search engine and new tab page to monetized alternatives, collecting search queries

extensions.name: Web Security
extensions.description: Firefox add-on with 220K users found transmitting full browsing history to servers in Germany

extensions.name: Quick access to ChatGPT
extensions.description: Edge extension stealing Facebook Business account tokens and session cookies for ad fraud operations

extensions.name: Great Suspender No Track
extensions.description: Fork of The Great Suspender that retained analytics code transmitting tab URLs and browsing patterns to third parties

extensions.name: Flash Player (Fake Update)
extensions.description: Fake Flash Player update extension distributing cryptocurrency miners and credential stealers via injected scripts
